summary: CONSUMER STATES WHILE DRIVING THE VEHICLE AND WITHOUT WARNING THE VEHICLE GAS PEDAL GETS STUCK. TS  GAS PEDAL STUCK AND HAD TO BE TAPPED TO GET TO MOVE.  THIS CAUSED EXCESSIVE ENGINE RPMS POSSIBLY CAUSING AN ACCIDENT.  CONSUMER HAD TO KEEP FOOT ON BRAKE TO PREVENT VEHICLE FROM LURGING FORWARD.   *TT
